sentences.en: A claimant is entitled to take civil action and commence criminal proceeding simultaneously.
sentences.cn: 原告有权在提起民事诉讼的同时,向法院提起刑事控诉.

sentences.en: Article 11 The claimant may, depending on different injuries suffered, file several claims for compensation.
sentences.cn: 第十一条赔偿请求人根据受到的不同损害, 可以同时提出数项赔偿要求.

sentences.en: Claim notification received from the claimant.
sentences.cn: 索赔人提出索赔之通知.

sentences.en: Does this accident result in Permanent Total Disablement of the claimant?
sentences.cn: 是次意外是否导致伤者完全永久丧失任何工作谋生能力?

sentences.en: Has the claimant sustained other losses of the same nature? If yes, please give full particulars.
sentences.cn: 以前曾否遭遇同样性质的损失? 若有, 请详述之.

sentences.en: He was a claimant to the throne.
If the maritime claimant fails to provide guarantee , the application shall be rejected.
sentences.cn: 海事请求人不提供的, 驳回其申请.

sentences.en: In earlier downturns, the jobless have been pushed off the claimant count and onto incapacity benefit.
sentences.cn: 在早期的衰退中, 失业者并不在救济申请者的名单之列,而被列在领取伤残救济的名单之中.

sentences.en: One of the problem is the bureaucracy the claimant have to face.
sentences.cn: 问题之一是申请人不得不面对的官僚主义.

sentences.en: Taxes shall not be levied upon the compensation money obtained by claimant for compensation.
sentences.cn: 对赔偿请求人取得的赔偿金不予征税.

sentences.en: The Claimant's claim along with underlying facts and evidence.
sentences.cn: 申请人的请求及所依据的事实和证据.

sentences.en: The expenses for arbitration shall be borne by the claimant ( respondent ).
sentences.cn: 仲裁费用将由原告 ( 被告 ) 负担.

sentences.en: There is a fine estate awaiting a claimant.
sentences.cn: 有一处良田美地等待我们去认领.

sentences.en: Whilst the claimant remains in service with pay ( including pre - retirement leave ) throughout the school terms covered.
sentences.cn: 申领人须于整个学期时段仍然在职和领取薪酬 ( 包括在放取退休前大假 ) .

sentences.en: Will it be in the country of the claimant?

words.tran_cn: 要求；声称；索赔；断言；值得
原告；[贸易]索赔人；提出要求者

trans.tran_cn: 原告，索取者，[法]原告，债权
trans.tran_en: someone who claims something, especially money, from the government, a court etc because they think they have a right to it
